ChangeList.Description: Added the **privateLinkResourcePolicies** relationship to the [policyRoot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **activateService** method from the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyAllowAccessTo** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyHasAccessTo** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyPendingMembers** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [reprocessLicenseAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-reprocessLicenseAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
